q1: Do you think their 2018 World Cup performance can be sustained in the future?
a1: It is hard to maintain over time
q2: What will the Croatia team look like next year?
a2: About the same, I do feel.they have peaked now.
q3: So you don't think that they will ever win the cup?
q4: What do you think made them get to the finals?
a4: I think it was a historical thing
q5: besides historical it was epic ... croatia deserved to win that final
a5: No I think France deserved it
